2026-02-09T11:41:31.1098418Z ##[group]Run # Generate a secure random API key (360 bits of entropy, 40+ chars)
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1098983Z [36;1m# Generate a secure random API key (360 bits of entropy, 40+ chars)[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1099347Z [36;1mAPI_KEY=""[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1099613Z [36;1mAPI_KEY=$(openssl rand -base64 45 | tr -d '/+=')[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1099928Z [36;1mPORT=3001[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1100108Z [36;1m[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1100343Z [36;1m# Register API key as secret to mask it from logs[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1100657Z [36;1mecho "::add-mask::${API_KEY}"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1100889Z [36;1m[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1101074Z [36;1m# Set outputs for next steps[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1101305Z [36;1m{[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1101514Z [36;1m  echo "safe_outputs_api_key=${API_KEY}"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1101811Z [36;1m  echo "safe_outputs_port=${PORT}"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1102069Z [36;1m} >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1102285Z [36;1m[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:31.1102532Z [36;1mecho "Safe Outputs MCP server will run on port ${PORT}"[0m
